description:
http://anidb.net/ch17479 [Ikkyuu] is a little boy training to be a monk at Ankokuji Temple. Known for being mischevious and bit of a troublemaker, but also extremely smart, Ikkyuu constantly thinks of new ways to outwit his frustrated teachers, helping others at the same time.
Source: ANN
